Package spring.ecommerce.controller

Class PaypalController

java.lang.Object
spring.ecommerce.controller.PaypalController
@CrossOrigin(origins="http://localhost:4200") @RestController @RequestMapping("/api/v1/payments") public class PaypalController extends Object
Controller for handling PayPal payment operations. Provides endpoints to create payments and handle payment statuses.

  • Constructor Details

    • PaypalController

      public PaypalController()

  • Method Details

    • createPayment

      @PostMapping public UrlPaypalResponseDto createPayment(@RequestBody DataPaymentDto dataPayment)
      Creates a PayPal payment and returns the approval URL.
      Parameters:
      dataPayment - The payment details received from the frontend.
      Returns:
      The PayPal approval URL or a default URL if an error occurs.

    • paymentSuccess

      @GetMapping("/success") public org.springframework.web.servlet.view.RedirectView paymentSuccess(@RequestParam("paymentId") String paymentId, @RequestParam("PayerID") String payerId)
      Handles successful PayPal payments. Executes the payment and redirects the user based on the payment state.
      Parameters:
      paymentId - The PayPal payment ID.
      payerId - The PayPal payer ID.
      Returns:
      A redirect to the appropriate URL based on payment success or failure.

    • paymentCancelled

      @GetMapping("/cancel") public org.springframework.web.servlet.view.RedirectView paymentCancelled()
      Handles canceled PayPal payments. Redirects the user to the home page upon payment cancellation.
      Returns:
      A redirect to the home page.

    • paymentError

      @GetMapping("/error") public org.springframework.web.servlet.view.RedirectView paymentError()
      Handles errors during PayPal payments. Redirects the user to the error page upon payment failure.
      Returns:
      A redirect to the error page.
